body_html:
@yifeif This doesn't seem resolved yet?

We probably should set defaults

# Set default CUDNN version if not set
if [ -z "$TF_CUDNN_VERSION" ]; then
  TF_CUDNN_VERSION="6"
  export TF_CUDNN_VERSION
fi

right after assigning them explicitly

# Configure the cuDNN version to use.
if [ -z "$TF_CUDNN_VERSION" ]; then
  read -p "Please specify the cuDNN version you want to use. [Leave empty to default to cuDNN 6.0]: " TF_CUDNN_VERSION
fi

The same applies to other variables as well.

body:
@yifeif This doesn't seem resolved yet?

We probably should set defaults
```
# Set default CUDNN version if not set
if [ -z "$TF_CUDNN_VERSION" ]; then
  TF_CUDNN_VERSION="6"
  export TF_CUDNN_VERSION
fi
```

right after assigning them explicitly

```
# Configure the cuDNN version to use.
if [ -z "$TF_CUDNN_VERSION" ]; then
  read -p "Please specify the cuDNN version you want to use. [Leave empty to default to cuDNN 6.0]: " TF_CUDNN_VERSION
fi
```

The same applies to other variables as well.
